DOC.brief_summary: To assess initial pharmacokinetic profile single dose 25mg 50 mg DVS SR healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evalutating Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Safety Single Dose Desvenlafaxine Sustained Release ( DVS SR )
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman Body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 Body weight great equal 60kg
